001
002import java.io.File;
003import java.io.RandomAccessFile;
004import java.util.List;
005
006/**
007 * favorites collector
008 *
009 * @author matecsaba
010 */
011public class favorites {
012
013    /**
014     * the main
015     *
016     * @param args arguments
017     */
018    public static void main(String[] args) {
019        String path = null;
020        String favf = args[0];
021        if (args.length > 1) {
022            path = args[1];
023        }
024        if (path == null) {
025            playerUtil.put("checking " + favf + "'s...");
026        } else {
027            playerUtil.put("copying " + favf + "'s to " + path + "...");
028        }
029        List<playerSong> need = playerSong.txt2pls(null, playerUtil.readup(favf));
030        playerSong.sort(need);
031        playerUtil.saveas(playerSong.pls2txt(need), favf);
032        for (int o = 0; o < need.size(); o++) {
033            playerSong ntry = need.get(o);
034            if (!new File(ntry.file).exists()) {
035                playerUtil.put("missing: " + ntry.file);
036                continue;
037            }
038            int i = playerSong.find(need, ntry);
039            if (i != o) {
040                playerUtil.put("duplicate: " + ntry.file);
041            }
042            if (path == null) {
043                continue;
044            }
045            i = ntry.file.lastIndexOf(".");
046            copyFile(ntry.file, path + ntry.title + ntry.file.substring(i, ntry.file.length()));
047        }
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * copy one file
052     *
053     * @param src source
054     * @param trg target
055     * @return true on error, false on success
056     */
057    public static boolean copyFile(String src, String trg) {
058        playerUtil.put(src + "-->" + trg + "...");
059        RandomAccessFile fs;
060        RandomAccessFile ft;
061        try {
062            new File(trg).createNewFile();
063        } catch (Exception e) {
064            return true;
065        }
066        long siz;
067        try {
068            fs = new RandomAccessFile(new File(src), "r");
069            siz = fs.length();
070            if (new File(trg).length() == siz) {
071                fs.close();
072                return false;
073            }
074            ft = new RandomAccessFile(new File(trg), "rw");
075            ft.setLength(0);
076        } catch (Exception e) {
077            return true;
078        }
079        long pos = 0;
080        for (; pos < siz;) {
081            final int max = 8 * 1024;
082            long rndl = siz - pos;
083            if (rndl > max) {
084                rndl = max;
085            }
086            pos += rndl;
087            int rndi = (int) rndl;
088            byte buf[] = new byte[rndi];
089            try {
090                fs.read(buf, 0, rndi);
091            } catch (Exception e) {
092                return true;
093            }
094            try {
095                ft.write(buf, 0, rndi);
096            } catch (Exception ex) {
097                return true;
098            }
099        }
100        try {
101            fs.close();
102        } catch (Exception e) {
103        }
104        try {
105            ft.close();
106        } catch (Exception e) {
107        }
108        return false;
109    }
110
111}
